apple.name: Apple iPhone 15 Pro
apple.description: Apple is going to unveil iPhone 15 series with the high-end 15 Pro Max variant. It is expected to have the latest processor, more RAM, a bigger battery, and a better camera system. It will also have a larger display and support 5G connectivity. samsung.description: Samsung is gearing up the Galaxy Z series by adding the new Fold 6 smartphone, which will be launched very soon, to take on the tough competition that is rising in the foldable market.
